description: Chocolates in China symbolize enduring love, referencing the Great Wall.
title: Enduring Love
n_1: Chun gifts Ling a chocolate box in a park.
c1_1: “For you, Ling, as enduring as the Great Wall.”
c2_1: “Such sweetness, Chun, it warms my heart.”
n_2: They share chocolates, overlooking the city.
c1_2: “Each piece is a testament to our love.”
c2_2: “And every bite is filled with love.”
n_3: As night falls, they reflect on their journey.
c1_3: “Our love has stood the test of time.”
c2_3: “Yes, as solid and enduring as the Wall.”
n_4: Under the starry sky, their love shines brightly.
c1_4: “I choose you, Ling, today and always.”
c2_4: “And I, you, Chun, forever and beyond.”
